title: ESV Audio Bible 11.0.4
text:
ESV Audio Bible 11.0.4
Global Bible Apps (FCBH)– Freeware – Android
out of 2149 votes
English Bible
Experience the Word of God in English with our free Bible app. It provides a convenient and cost-free way for you to read, listen, and meditate on the scriptures.
Key Features:
- Download the Audio Bible (New Testament) in English for free, without any advertisements!
- Read and listen to the text, with each verse highlighted as it is read.
- Bookmark and highlight your favorite verses, add personal notes, and search for specific words in the Bible.
- Verse of the Day & Daily Reminder - Customize your notifications and choose to listen to the verse of the day or create a Bible verse wallpaper from the notification itself.
- Bible Verse Wallpaper Creator - Design beautiful wallpapers with your favorite Bible verses on attractive photo backgrounds. Share them with your friends and on social media.
- Easily navigate chapters by swiping.
- Night Mode for comfortable reading in low light conditions.
- Click and share Bible verses with friends via Whatsapp, Facebook, E-mail, SMS, and other platforms.
- Compatible with all versions of Android devices.
- No additional font installation required.
- New user-friendly interface with a navigation drawer menu.
- Adjustable font size and intuitive interface.
Compatibility: This app is optimized for Android 10.0 but will also run smoothly on devices with versions 4.1 (Jelly Bean) and later.
Please feel free to share this app with your friends and relatives. If you have any feedback or questions, contact us at globalbibleapps@fcbhmail.org
Text: The ESV® Bible (The Holy Bible, English Standard Version®) is an adaptation of the Revised Standard Version of the Bible. All rights reserved.
